SENDSPIN.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Configure Sendspin Protocol client settings. This plugin connects to Sendspin servers (e.g. Music Assistant) to receive audio streams.
SENDSPIN.ENABLED_DOC: Enable or disable the Sendspin Protocol client. When enabled, this device will connect to Sendspin servers and receive audio streams.
SENDSPIN.PORT_DOC: Manual server address (host:port). Leave blank to auto-discover servers via mDNS.
SENDSPIN.DEVICE_NAME_DOC: Name displayed to Sendspin servers when discovering this player
